ygData.subject: Level 7
ygData.msgSnippet: Just looking for a little encouragement, was Level 7 the most difficult for everyone?   I m struggling to get to 8, my pet doesn t seem to help much and my
ygData.messageBody:
Just looking for a little encouragement, was Level 7 the most difficult
for everyone? I'm struggling to get to 8, my pet doesn't seem to help
much and my Mana regeneration is very slow, even with meditate. I know
things get better at 8 but will every level like this (11,15,19 etc.)
be this difficult? Or is just me? My ranger character advanced easily
until he hit the teens so this has been frustrating. Is grouping the
only solution to problems like these? Not my first choice....

Thanks,
Saga-Mith.Marr
